properties.Name: ConfidentialityAgreement

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: AgreementEffectiveDate
Columns.Description: The date that the Confidentiality Agreement goes into effect.

Columns.Name: ConfidentialInformationSection
Columns.Description: This section defines the information that is considered to be confidential information in the agreement.

Columns.Name: ObligationsSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes the obligations of the recipient in respect to the confidential information provided by the owner of that information.

Columns.Name: TermSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes the length of the time that the information will be kept confidential.

Columns.Name: OtherInformationSection
Columns.Description: This section identified other information provided by the owner that is not considered to be confidential in nature.   The recipient is not required to keep information confidential if the public has access to it, a third party provides the same information to the recipient or the recipient develops the same information without use of the owner's original information.

Columns.Name: LicenseSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes the arrangement that the owner has with the recipient by providing information.   For example, no specific relationship exists other than the providing of information to fulfill a specific objective.

Columns.Name: DocumentSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes the rules upon which the recipient may discuss with public sources the information provided by the owner.

Columns.Name: GoverningLawAndEquitableReliefSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes the right of the owner to seek equitable relief should the recipient breach the agreement.

Columns.Name: FinalAgreementSection
Columns.Description: This section makes it clear that this is the final agreement between parties and replaces or supersedes any prior discussions or agreements.    Any amendments to this agreement must be made in writing.

Columns.Name: AssignmentSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes the conditions under which the recipient may assign to a third party its interests.

Columns.Name: SeverabilitySection
Columns.Description: This section attempts to keep the agreement in effect even if a court rules that a portion is invalid.

Columns.Name: ImpliedWaiverSection
Columns.Description: This section makes clear that a single waiver to a contract obligation does not constitute a waiver in any other contractual cases.

Properties.Description: A Confidentiality Agreement states that the recipient of information will not share it with anyone else.

properties.Description: A Confidentiality Agreement states that the recipient of information will not share it with anyone else.
